text.section:
Subject to § 12-308.1 of this subtitle, unless a license is renewed for a 2-year term as provided in this section, the license expires on the first May 1 that comes:
after the effective date of the license; and
in an odd-numbered year.

At least 1 month before a license expires, the Board shall mail to the licensee, at the last known address of the licensee:
a renewal application form; and
a notice that states:
the date on which the current license expires;
the date by which the Board must receive the renewal application for the renewal to be issued and mailed before the license expires; and
the amount of the renewal fee.
The Board shall renew the license of and issue a renewal certificate to each licensee who meets the requirements of this section.
The Secretary may determine that licenses and certificates issued under this subtitle shall expire on a staggered basis.
